name: Sweet Dungeon
description:
this Is A Platform Jump Leisure Game


Beautiful three girls, after passing the customs, there will be extra plot

convenient Player and Good Music

interactive Events
after Passing, Endless Mode Appears
Move your hand quickly, if you are a man, you will go down to 100 floors!!!

The scenario of extra mode can only be activated by installing DLC. The specific installation
method is in the comment area below.

NOTES:

1. If the windowed game flashes, please use full screen mode to play. If there is no response when switching games, please press Ctrl + Alt + Del, and then press ESC.
2. If you can't pass the level, you can choose the cheating mode.

Buy game please add 1105310998 QQ group. There are follow-up rewards.

Press "Win + R" and enter: steam://install/1405840 Install DLC
